name: graviton
author: Jeremy Barnes
description: Spafax HUB media asset management software

scripts.install: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run install-prod || npm run install-dev
scripts.install-prod: npm run install-server && npm run install-react
scripts.install-dev: npm run install-server && npm run install-react && npm run install-electron
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-react
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start-prod || npm run start-dev
scripts.start-dev: npm run start-server-dev && npm run start-react-dev && npm run start-electron-dev
